predicate.note: Frames file for 'infer' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Coming to believe.

example.name: passive
example.text: Agreement, disapproval, boredom and distraction all can be inferred [*-1] from the subjects' twist of a dial.
example.arg: [*-1] -> Agreement, disapproval, boredom and distraction all
the subjects' twist of a dial

example.name: active
example.text: Mary inferred John's role in ``The Pasta Incident'' from his guilty expression.
